segments.text: The angled view shows the kitchen's right wall clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands drying her plate diligently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, the overflowing sink catches my eye.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water floods out, drenching the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepping in it without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy on the unstable stool, hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up for her cookie share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup screams impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains tied back frame the peaceful yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and fence look so orderly outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, water damage is surely starting.
segments.speaker: PAR
